Establishing Faith in Bible Truth 

     "I attended the camp meeting held at Waterville, Maine, September 6-11. Here in my native State I met dear brethren and sisters whose interest has for years been identified with the cause and work of present truth. . . . We had some very precious seasons at this camp meeting. Many cheering testimonies were borne; but there was not that thorough work which we greatly desired to have accomplished. . . . There is a kind of faith that takes it for granted that we have the truth; but the faith that takes God 
                                                                           278
at His word, which works by love and purifies the heart, is very rare."
